citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 PM on 19
December 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone. Arrived at facility, called the facility
representative and left a message, rang the doorbell and sent a text message. Received a message back that the facility
representative was not available and the facility no longer housed education animals.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 PM on 19 
December 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone. Arrived at facility, called the facility 
representative and left a message, rang the doorbell and sent a text message. Received a message back that the facility 
representative was not available and the facility no longer housed education animals. 
 
 
End Section
